column1: '''Air New Zealand''' is the national airline and flag carrier of [[New Zealand]] based in Auckland.
It has promoted the films by Sir [[Peter Jackson]]
column4: with cooperation with Jackson and [[Weta Workshop]]
column5: released several cross-promotion Middle-earth inspired videos.

column1: The videos feature [[Tolkien]] characters such as [[Gandalf]] and [[Gwaihir]]
*[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qOw44VFNk8Y The Most Epic Safety Video Ever Made]
